title: Ghost players/Fake players
body:
Hello. I have been having a problem lately and this problem has caused lots of losing streaks. I always seem to get at least one ghost player in my team. Ghost players or at least that is what I call them are players that don't talk and not respond to ANYTHING. (e.g. surrender vote.) They do not give any heck about team fight and they just go random lanes. Also, they like feed on purpose every lane so it makes our lives harder. How do you deal with these guys?!

From Zed main {{champion:238}}

replies.body: Oh wait, is OP talking about bots?

I got the impression he was talking about the players that don't communicate, who may or may not have a reason for doing so and may or may not simply disagree on how a game should be played. But bots would fit too so I don't really know tbh.

{{summoner:6}}  players are {{champion:120}} , {{champion:27}} , etc.
Use the right words if you want to make a point
